name: Chibi Maker App
description:
In this doll maker, you can create an immense number of adorable, chibi characters, fantasy and modern. A 'chibi' is a small or child version of a character often depicted in anime and manga. This game has a seemingly endless amount of options which blend together seamlessly.

Instructions Click on the green menu buttons then click on save to save your character.

You can create too many variations of the character and make it similar to anyone.

Good luck with your creativity.
